h2_title: All 6 Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball Locations
h3_title: Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball 3 Location
content: Once you reach the statue on your left, take a left and head towards the shaded area. The Buddha's Eyeball can be found here.
promot:

The content is as follows:
Once you reach the statue on your left, take a left and head towards the shaded area. The Buddha's Eyeball can be found here.
